document.masterDocTitle: The identity of Acanthosoma vicinum, with proposal of a new genus and species level synonymy (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Acanthosomatidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The identity of Acanthosoma vicinum, with proposal of a new genus and species level synonymy (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Acanthosomatidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Tropidocoris
Schummel, 1828
: 65 . Unavailable name. Synonymized by
Schummel ( 1835 : 91 )
with
Clinocoris
Hahn, 1834
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Clinocoris
Hahn, 1834
: 70
. Type species by subsequent designation (
Kirkaldy 1909 : xxxii
): Cimex ferrugator Fabricius, 1794 (= Cimex ferrugatus Fabricius, 1787 ). Junior homonym of
Clinocoris Fallén, 1829
( Cimicidae ). Synonymized by
Stål ( 1876 : 114 )
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Sastragala (non Amyot & Serville, 1843 ):
Fieber ( 1860
: 78 ; 1861 : 327 ). Misidentification (
Stål 1864 : 54
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Elasmucha
Stål, 1864
: 54
. Type species by subsequent designation (
Kirkaldy 1909 : xxxii
): Cimex ferrugatus Fabricius, 1787 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Meadorus Mulsant & Rey, 1866 : 312, 315 . Type species by subsequent designation (
Kirkaldy 1909 : xxxii
): Meadorus interstinctus (non Linnaeus, 1758 ): Mulsant & Rey ( 1866 : 316 ) (= Cimex griseus Linnaeus, 1758 ). Synonymized by
Stål ( 1868 : 39 )
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Elasmostethus
(non
Fieber, 1860
):
Lethierry & Severin ( 1893 : 255 )
. Misidentification (
Oshanin 1906 : 168
).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Pseudostollia
Breddin, 1901
: 65 . Type species by original designation:
Acanthosoma delicatula Walker, 1867
. Synonymized by
Kumar ( 1974 : 48 )
.

Galasastra
Breddin, 1903
: 205 . Type species by monotypy: Galasastra salebrosa
Breddin, 1903
. Synonymized by
Kumar ( 1974 : 48 )
.

Grossaria
Kumar, 1974
: 42, 47 . Type species by original designation:
Acanthosoma vicinum
Uhler, 1861
. New subjective synonym.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Discussion. The genus Grossaria was proposed for
Acanthosoma vicinum
by
Kumar ( 1974 )
based on the examination of a single male (the lectotype ). The author expressed that Grossaria is similar to
Elasmucha
but it differs from the latter genus in the shorter spine of the abdominal ventrite III that reaches only to the posterior ends of the hind coxae (it reaches at least to anterior ends of the hind coxae in
Elasmucha
) and in unspecified characters of the male genitalia.

Reexamination of the lectotype of
A. vicinum
, including its male genitalia, revealed that it is a male of
Elasmucha dorsalis
. The spine of the abdominal ventrite III of the lectotype was correctly described by
Uhler ( 1861 )
and does not differ from that of other species of
Elasmucha
; the difference noted by
Kumar ( 1974 )
is merely ostensible, resulting from the fact that the specimen is broken between the metathorax and the abdomen (cf.
Fig. 2
). We disagree with
Kumar ( 1974 )
that the male genitalia support placement of
A. dorsalis
in a genus of its own, and therefore we propose the following new subjective synonymy:
Elasmucha
Stål, 1864
= Grossaria
Kumar, 1974
, syn. nov.

As a consequence of the new genus level synonymy proposed above, the following new combination will be necessary:
Elasmucha vicina (
Uhler, 1861
)
, comb. nov.
